title: Physics Laws
content:
F=ma (Newton 2nd)
v=u+at
s=ut+1/2*at^2
v^2=u^2+2as
KE=1/2*mv^2
PE=mgh
P=W/t (power)

title: Chemistry
content:
PV=nRT (ideal gas)
pH=-log[H+]
Molarity=moles/litre
Avogadro=6.022x10^23
Atomic mass unit=1.66x10^-27 kg

title: English Tips
content:
Affect=verb, Effect=noun
There=place, Their=possessive, They're=they are
Use active voice when possible

title: Biology
content:
Cell: nucleus holds DNA
Photosynthesis: CO2+H2O->C6H12O6+O2 (needs sunlight)
Respiration: C6H12O6+O2->CO2+H2O+ATP
